verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 3:15
verses.text: Yet count him not as an enemy, but admonish him as a brother.

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 3:16
verses.text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means. The Lord be with you all.

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 3:17
verses.text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand, which is the token in every epistle: so I write.

verses.name: 2 Thessalonians 3:18
verses.text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen.  The second epistle to the Thessalonians was written from Athens.
